experience: You and Peter. both know Craig McLaughlin, Luma Dahlbacka, and 100 others
Peter. can introduce you to 8 people at Oracle

•	Oversaw implementation of BPM enterprise financial application software supporting over 50K transactions daily and over 10,000 end users •	Manage daily information technology operations with 4 development teams and over 60 direct reports for the 24/7 financial business operations•	Analyze and research technology trends and innovations to optimize organizational performance competitive advantage•	Solve complex problems and find solutions to internal roadblocks and issues which impede the progress of I.T. process and implementations•	Work closely with CIO, Vice Presidents and Directors to prioritize, plan and execute I.T. initiatives•	Create information technology framework and best practices ensuring security and stability •	Implement DEV OPS – reducing deployment times by 80%•	Integrate across Enterprise Domains and develop cost cutting information application systems •	Manage Cloud Co-Browsing application for external Financial Advisor firms and internal reps•	Create SPLUNK Dashboards for proactive monitoring and alerting at all levels in the organization •	Design the scope, scale and future projections of information technology implementations•	Establish and manage relationships with vendors, solution providers, consultants and outsourcing firms•	Manage the information technology budget in excess of $10 million annually

•	Managed the SWISS engineering team (Schwab Workflow and Imaging Solutions) through production and support of critical systems affecting incoming customer correspondence processed by over 3,000 users•	Oversaw workload and performance of 10 Java, .NET and VB Developers•	Led the SWISS team through several years of volume business growth and expansions•	Project Manager over infrastructure upgrades, e.g. WL/Solaris to WAS ND/Linux, Oracle Solaris to Linux, FileNET IS to P8•	Increased productivity 100% by establishing and adhering to the SWISS team release calendar•	Redesigned and improved disaster recovery time by 90%

•	Oversaw daily processing of over 10K correspondence utilizing SWISS both national and internationally representing a $6 million cost saving•	Implemented the SWISS team infrastructure with a $3 million budget to 6 operational centers, 2,000 users with 34 servers and 700 PCs •	Managed the annual operating budget of over $4.5 million•	Led the cross functional enterprise teams, including training and converting images, files and documents into one application •	Implemented the Rational Unified Process development methodology

•	Oversaw company-wide consolidation of all cashiering business rules and transactions managed by 10 applications into one comprehensive application•	Managed the workload and performance of a team of Java and Mainframe developers•	Project Manager over the implementation of 3 tier EJB, JSP and J2EE Java applications•	Led the development of browser base application with 4000 users, the regulatory transactions for ROTH accounts, wire transfers and new cashiering/ecommerce on Schwab.com and call centers transactions
•	Technical Program Manager for strategic Personal Choice Retirement Account•	Created and implemented innovative software for Personal Choice Retirement Account

Technology Executive | Change Agent | Optimizer | Leader
August 2, 2017, Peter. reported directly to Scott

In my 15+ years in IT, I can honestly say Scott is the best leader I have had the privilege to work with.  He has a proven record as an agent for change. I was working on a challenged enterprise project when Scott came in to take over the tech team. He quickly turned the situation around by focusing on the following areas: ·         Vision – he worked closely with the stakeholders to define a clear direction, purpose and goals for the initiative.·         Focus on the essentials – defining the key levers for success, stripping away detractors, allowing the teams to focus unencumbered on realizing the goals·         Build highly effective teams – assessing the resourcing needs, skills gap and quickly filling these. Enabling focused, autonomous teams with responsibility for the outcome·         Team building – practicing a participative leadership style, earning the trust and respect from his team, peers and stakeholders.  It has been an amazing learning opportunity and honor to work with Scott

Diana Cheng-Lau
Innovation technology leader specializes in Quality Assurance/Testing - proven successes to transform teams to be Agile.
August 1, 2017, Peter. managed Diana directly

I have had the pleasure of working with Diana for 5+ years on a large scale BPM Enterprise solution. She was managing and leading the QA team with a constant focus on improvement. She re-tooled the team to focus on automation and was able to significantly increase the test coverage while at the same time reduce test cycle time. She was able to fully integrated the QA efforts into the Agile continuous delivery model.Diana is a great manager and leader. She drives proficiency and efficiency while working with diverse on- and off-shore teams. She is dedicated and trustworthy. Diana is a great asset to any IT team dedicated to high standards.

summary: Over 15 years experience in leadership, team building, innovation and problem solving across multiple organizational partnerships both internal and external. Responsible for designing, developing and managing all information technology and multi-million dollar software applications within one of the largest Fortune 500 top-tier bank and brokerage firms in the United States.CAREER ACHIEVEMENTS• Built selective high-performance teams integrating offshore contractors, employees and professional services to support software development and 24x7 production and support functions• Aligned tailored business processes and strategy, enabling the servicing of over 50,000 requests daily, supporting 5,000 concurrent users world wide  • Managed multiple multifaceted projects and initiatives throughout the entire organization. Successfully set and achieved all milestones; within budget and scope using an iterative framework such as Agile SCRUM methodology.QUALIFICATION HIGHLIGHTS• Consistently demonstrated exceptional project management and leadership in building and managing diverse global technology teams for the purpose of implementing all aspects of strategy, planning, budgeting, communication and delivery of large multipart complex software applications and infrastructure development lifecycle including SCRUM and RUP • Proficient in managing in dynamic environments, balancing tactical and strategic objectives, leading change and innovation, evolving effectual processes and systems to drive results• Excellent management, technical and supervisory skills; financial planning, forecasting, requiting and budgeting• Broad Financial Services background including brokerage and banking; trust, custody, retirement and 401k
